description: Laurie Zrenda is a licensed pharmacist and medical marijuana dispensary owner. As a pharmacist, Zrenda was allowed to own and operate a dispensary in Connecticut. (Photo by Jessie Wardarski | News 21)
An employee at Laurie Zrenda's dispensary, Thames Valley Alternative Relief in Uncasville, Connecitcut, displays a container for medical marijuana. (Photo by Jessie Wardarski | News 21)

A board displays available strains and medical marijuana-infused products at Thames Valley Alternative Relief. In Connecticut, dispensaries may not display names like "Purple Kush" or similar pop culture titles. (Photo by Jessie Wardarski | News 21)
Connecticut requires dispensaries to formerly distinguish medical marijuana products, even these chocolatey bites. (Photo by Jessie Wardarski | News 21)
